name.japanese: ゴーイング・メリー号

description: The Straw Hat Pirates' first ship, a caravel given to them by Kaya. In this episode, it serves as the location where Nami falls ill and the crew witnesses snow falling over the ocean.

keyEvents.title: Nami Shows First Symptoms
keyEvents.description: Nami begins showing symptoms of illness aboard the Going Merry, asking Vivi to watch the Eternal Pose.
keyEvents.significance: The location where the critical plot development begins that will lead to the Drum Island Arc.

keyEvents.title: Nami Collapses on the Going Merry
keyEvents.description: Nami collapses with a severe 40°C fever on the deck of the Going Merry, causing panic among the crew.
keyEvents.significance: The moment that forces the crew to urgently seek medical help.

keyEvents.title: Course Change to Avoid Cyclone
keyEvents.description: Following Nami's warning, Zoro orders a course change on the Going Merry to avoid a dangerous cyclone.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the crew's teamwork and trust in Nami's navigation skills.

keyEvents.title: Snow Falls on the Going Merry
keyEvents.description: The crew witnesses snow mysteriously falling over the ocean while aboard the Going Merry.
keyEvents.significance: Signals the approach to a winter island and builds atmosphere for the upcoming arc.

statusHistory.reason: Ship is operational and sailing through the Grand Line

description: A prehistoric island in the Grand Line where the Straw Hats previously visited. Home to ancient fauna including the deadly Kestia tick that infected Nami with the Five-Day Disease. Mr. 2 is sent here in this episode.

keyEvents.title: Mr. 2 Arrives at Little Garden
keyEvents.description: Mr. 2 Bon Kurei is dispatched to Little Garden to eliminate Mr. 3 for his failure.
keyEvents.significance: Shows Baroque Works' ruthless nature and sets up Mr. 2's character arc.

keyEvents.title: Flashbacks to Giants' Duel
keyEvents.description: The episode includes flashbacks showing the giants Dorry and Brogy's century-long duel on Little Garden.
keyEvents.significance: Provides additional context to the previous arc.

keyEvents.title: Source of Nami's Illness Revealed
keyEvents.description: It's revealed that Nami contracted the Five-Day Disease from a Kestia tick bite on Little Garden.
keyEvents.significance: Explains the danger of the prehistoric island and establishes the cause of the current crisis.
